text: James Edward Fitzmorris Jr. (born November 15, 1921) is an American politician who served on the New Orleans City Council from 1954 to 1966 and as Lieutenant Governor of Louisiana from 1972 to 1980. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Louisiana Democrats Category:Living people Category:Politicians from New Orleans Category:Lieutenant Governors of Louisiana Category:Military personnel from Louisiana City Council Category:New Orleans City Council members
title: Jimmy Fitzmorris
